imdb.plot outline: Saheli is a story of two friends, Raheela and Afsheen, who share a great bond of trust, but their parents disapprove of this friendship. Raheela fancies Raja Omair, a Casanova. The story takes a turn when Omair is introduced to Afsheen, and he declares his love for her. The friendship is threatened and they drift apart after several disputes between the families. The play showcases how these two friends begin their lives separately, and the problems they face.
imdb.title: Saheli
plot: _Saheli_ (qv) is a story of two friends, Raheela and Afsheen, who share a great bond of trust, but their parents disapprove of this friendship. Raheela fancies Raja Omair, a Casanova. The story takes a turn when Omair is introduced to Afsheen, and he declares his love for her. The friendship is threatened and they drift apart after several disputes between the families. The play showcases how these two friends begin their lives separately, and the problems they face.::wajid zafar
